descriptionHtml:
Craftable bondage gag (you can craft it in the forge under "leather" or use the console to add it)

Install:
NMM or unpack in main directory

Uninstall:

NMM or delete these files and folders:

Bondage Harness Gag.esp (in DATA folder)
Dob1 folder (in meshes)
BHgag folder (in textures)

Big thanks to Nightasy for his great tutorials on youtube :)

Here are some links with my work

DeviantArt http://dob1.deviantart.com/gallery/
Youtube http://www.youtube.com/user/Dob1Art
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Dob1/660430533973819?ref=stream
author: Dob1
